com.ezrebclan.asset

Class BigTextAsset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ezrebclan.asset.Asset<java.lang.String[]>
      • com.ezrebclan.asset.BigTextAsset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loadable, Saveable

    public class BigTextAsset
extends Asset<java.lang.String[]>
    A Big Text Asset is multiple lines of text, stored in a string array.
    If you need to store a single line of text, look into a Small Text Asset.
    Author:
    Mrab Ezreb

      • Fields inherited from class com.ezrebclan.asset.Asset

    • Method Detail

      • saveData

        protected void saveData(java.io.OutputStream output)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: Asset
        Called when saving the asset. Subclasses override this in order to save the asset's data into the asset object.
        Specified by:
        saveData in class Asset<java.lang.String[]>
        Parameters:
        output - This is a direct reference to the asset's outputstream. Write the asset DIRECTLY to this parameter.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws any exceptions

      • loadData

        protected java.lang.String[] loadData(java.io.InputStream input)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: Asset
        Called when loading the asset. Subclasses override this in order to load the asset's data into the asset object.
        Specified by:
        loadData in class Asset<java.lang.String[]>
        Parameters:
        input - This is a direct reference to the asset's inputstream. Read the asset DIRECTLY from this parameter.
        Returns:
        The asset data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws any exceptions
